bludger.detail: You can't get too close. The bludger seems intent on sending you to the hospital wing.
bludger.name: bludger
bludger.description: A bludger is twitching on the ground.

scrap of paper.taste: Well, if it is a password, you can't be too careful...Ick.
scrap of paper.detail: On the paper is scrawled 'Pig Snout', whatever that means.
scrap of paper.name: scrap of paper
scrap of paper.description: A crumpled scrap of paper is here.

food.name: food
food.description: There are plates heaped with the finest Scottish cuisine.

broom.detail: The broom is an old and battered Nimbus 2000.
broom.name: broom

mirror.detail: You become lost in a sort of reverie as you gaze into the mirror. This seems unsafe.
mirror.name: mirror
mirror.description: There is a large, dingy, streaky mirror in the corner.

candy.taste: You taste the candy, but you've never been fond of fizzing whizbees. Perhaps someone else in the castle is...
candy.detail: They appear to be fizzing whizbees.
candy.name: candy
candy.description: There is some candy in a heap.

diary.detail: Spidery writing appears on the pages as you flip through.
diary.description: An old and battered book lies discarded in the corner.
diary.name: diary

trevor.description: A small toad (or is it small? You have no clue how big toads usually are) is blinking cautiously up at you.
trevor.name: trevor
trevor.detail: You croak at the toad. After a long conversation you discover that his name is Trevor.

snitch.detail: The snitch is jumping around too quickly for you to get a good look.
snitch.name: snitch
snitch.description: A golden snitch hovers in the air!

bones.detail: The skeleton is of a large, dinosaur-like creature.
bones.name: bones
bones.description: A large skeleton lies on the floor.
